meanings.sent1: I enjoy smoking cigarillos on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He bought a pack of cigarillos for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: The tiny squirrel thought the cigarillo was a tree and tried to climb it.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced delicately around the cigarillo, like a conductor directing an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cigarillo lingered in the room long after it was smoked.

meanings.definition: A cigarillo is a short, narrow cigar.
meanings.sent1: The shop sells a variety of cigarillos from different countries.
meanings.sent2: She lit a cigarillo and took a puff, savoring the rich flavor.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a cigarillo instead of a hat.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was dotted with cigarillos of light from the buildings.
meanings.sent5: The cigarillo burned slowly, releasing curls of smoke into the air.
